entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
